title: Metaverse and VR-Based Language Education Experiential Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented language education program using metaverse and VR technologies for students aspiring to enter professional fields in medicine, law, and technology

learning_goals: Learners can perform simulation dialogue scenarios related to specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) in VR environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can generate three or more context-appropriate language expressions through role-play activities with peers using collaboration tools on a metaverse platform.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of educational tools and propose two improvement strategies using a VR content evaluation rubric based on experiential learning theory.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
